entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cartwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 30 except minus 34 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 30 except minus 34 inland. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
